headline: Oracle’s Massive AI Cloud Raise Tests Debt And Customer Concentration
summary: Oracle (NYSE:ORCL) is pursuing a capital raise of about US$45b to US$50b to fund cloud infrastructure expansion for artificial intelligence customers. The package is expected to include large new debt and equity offerings tied to demand from clients such as OpenAI and Meta. The move comes as investors debate the risks of heavy AI related spending, higher leverage, and stress in parts of the bond market. Oracle has long been known for its database and enterprise software franchise, and more...

headline: Oracle (ORCL) Has a Balance Sheet From Hell, Says Jim Cramer
summary: We recently published 12 Stocks on Jim Cramer’s Radar. Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. Data center and enterprise software provider Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL)’s shares haven’t performed well lately. They are down by 18% over the past year and by 27% year-to-date. headline: Citizens Cut the PT on Oracle Corporation (ORCL) to $285 From $342 – Here’s Why
summary: Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) is one of the most promising future stocks to buy now. Citizens revised the price target on Oracle Corporation (NYSE:ORCL) to $285 from $342 on February 5 and reaffirmed an Outperform rating. The firm told investors that the stock’s shares have remained under pressure despite its $30 billion debt financing and tightening […]
